contents: We hate to have to bring this to you, but the humans have set up a horrible fair with rides
up in the park, it is so busy and loud and is disturbing all the pigeons and squirrels.
Could you please tell the humans to get rid of it?

option tags.y: tell the humans to take down the fair
option tags.n: let the humans keep the fair up

contents: The humans take down the fairground as per your request, but they are not pleased.
The squirrels and pigeons are annoyed you didn't listen to them, but you do make
some money from the fair fees.
